GeneDef.label: extreme skeptic
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively doubt that there is a such thing as an "interdimensional horror" or that these "entities" are anything more than a weird animal. This instinctive belief is so entrenched in their mind that they refuse to even entertain the idea of studying them.

GeneDef.label: skeptic
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively doubt that there is a such thing as an "interdimensional horror" or that these "entities" are anything more than a weird animal. This instinctive belief makes it harder for them study such beings as a part of their mind is distracted searching for a more natural explanation.
